title: Microfabrication Process and Technology
description: The module presents an overview of CMOS fabrication process with the focus on the materials engineering and the physics behind the technologies used in the fabrication process.  The technologies include cleaning process, photolithography and resist, the formation of thermal oxides and Si/SiO2 interface, dopant diffusion and ion implantation, etching, thin film deposition technology, and interconnects/contacts.
